comments.body: should be moved after line 205 (otherwise the error message is reporting None).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +201,205 @@        if self.snapshotId is None and 'fileSystemId' in self.data:
            self.fileSystemId = self.getfilesystemId()
            self.data['fileSystemId'] = self.fileSystemId
            if self.fileSystemId is None:
                self.module.fail_json(msg='Error: Specified filesystem id %s does not exist ' % self.data['fileSystemId'])

comments.body: why do we need a deep copy of self.parameters?   It seems self.data is redundant.
